mapper.select: select max(rnk) from (select cmpyCd ,cmpyNm, ptrn ,age ,prdNm , rank() over(order by cmpyCd) as rnk from bohum group by cmpyCd,cmpyNm, ptrn , age ,prdNm having age=#{age})

select cmpyCd ,cmpyNm, ptrn ,age ,prdNm ,count(*) as mogCount
,sum(fmlInsRt) as priceSum
,sum(mlInsRt) as priceSum
from bohum group by cmpyCd,cmpyNm, ptrn , age ,prdNm having age=#{age}
